Manifest.Name: ebkr-r2modman
Manifest.Description: A simple and easy to use mod manager for many games using Thunderstore

Manifest.Name: BepInEx-BepInExPack_Silksong
Manifest.Description: BepInEx modloader. Preconfigured and ready to use.

Manifest.Name: DatUub-QuestMod
Manifest.Description: Quest management mod for Silksong — accept, complete, and customize quest targets with a full debug GUI.

Manifest.Name: silksong_modding-ModMenu
Manifest.Description: API for extending Silksong Menus

Manifest.Name: DerVorce-Void_Crest
Manifest.Description: Adds a new crest to the game, based off the abyss as a whole more-so than The Knight

Manifest.Name: kaycodes13-QueenCrest
Manifest.Description: A custom crest themed around The White Lady. Nimble attacks, rapid silk generation, and heavy silk skill usage.

Manifest.Name: Eylonsh-IncreaseShards
Manifest.Description: A mod to Increase Shard drop-rate and maximum. By default multiplies by 3, can be changed in config.

Manifest.Name: Eylonsh-SeparateFloating
Manifest.Description: Small mod that gives the floating action its own button, at the inventory quests panel's expence :D

Manifest.Name: Syncinfl0ow-HornetSings
Manifest.Description: Play Sherma's bell and sing with him

Manifest.Name: Voidlings-Needleforge
Manifest.Description: API for adding Crests and Tools

Manifest.Name: ant_of_doom-LieButton
Manifest.Description: A simple cosmetic mod for Silksong. Click a certain button to lie down (customizable).

Manifest.Name: cometcake575-Architect
Manifest.Description: The Silksong level editor mod, easily make and share custom levels with an in-game level editor and level sharer.

Manifest.Name: PimpasPimpinela-HueShifter
Manifest.Description: Changes the map's colours using shaders. Can also make everything rainbows!

Manifest.Name: dreamfactory-InfiniteTools
Manifest.Description: A mod to have infinite resources for your tools, according to your choice.

Manifest.Name: fabbeyond-RandomTeleport
Manifest.Description: A mod that teleports hornet to a random room every x seconds

Manifest.Name: Vitaxses-QoL
Manifest.Description: Quality of Life mod

Manifest.Name: EpsilonDelta-MitosisDancers
Manifest.Description: A mod that lets you fight duplicating cogwork dancers.

Manifest.Name: danatron1-Maggot_Every_Hit
Manifest.Description: Inflicts the maggot debuff whenever the player takes damage

Manifest.Name: hk_speedrunning-DebugMod
Manifest.Description: The premier practice tool for Silksong, with fully-featured savestates, cheats, and many more features. Based on Hollow Knight's DebugMod.

Manifest.Name: danielstegink-SellShards
Manifest.Description: Adds option to sell Shell Shards for Rosaries

Manifest.Name: silksong_modding-DataManager
Manifest.Description: DataManager is a mod that saves and loads data - global as well as save slot-specific - on behalf of other mods.

Manifest.Name: shownyoung-KnightInSilksong
Manifest.Description: A mod that allows you to control little knight in Silksong

Manifest.Name: cometcake575-SimpleEnemyRando
Manifest.Description: A basic Silksong enemy and boss randomiser made using Architect.

Manifest.Name: silksong_modding-FsmUtil
Manifest.Description: A library for mods to easily make changes to PlayMakerFSMs.

Manifest.Name: SSMP-SSMP
Manifest.Description: Silksong Multiplayer allows people to host games and let others join them in their adventures.

Manifest.Name: CC_Collection-ForsakenSentinels
Manifest.Description: Adds Second Sentinel to the Phantom fight with a new attack. Crossing certain hp thresholds of either boss will lower the other's hp.

Manifest.Name: CC_Collection-ThreadspunWraithPhantomOverhaul
Manifest.Description: An overhaul of the Phantom boss fight, featuring a new phase and design.

Manifest.Name: spacemonkeyy-DisableAchievements
Manifest.Description: Prevents any achievements, menu styles, or extra game modes from unlocking.

Manifest.Name: Norrie_Boy-Pharlooms_Glory
Manifest.Description: Modifies game assets in specific areas to experience them as they once were.

Manifest.Name: chunniunai-Radiance
Manifest.Description: Radiance is a Hollow Knight: Silksong mod that adds a new challenge room in the **top-left area of BellTown**. From this new entrance, you can challenge **Radiance**

Manifest.Name: danielstegink-CrestOptimizer
Manifest.Description: Custom settings for Crests

Manifest.Name: homothety-Benchwarp
Manifest.Description: Plugin to adjust bench respawn location ingame

Manifest.Name: lagerthon-CorruptedHealth
Manifest.Description: Hornet is fast when she is healthy — and so is the world around her

Manifest.Name: MonoDetour-MonoDetour_BepInEx_5
Manifest.Description: HarmonyX interop & BepInEx 5 logger integration for MonoDetour. Initializes MonoDetour early as a side effect.

Manifest.Description: Easy and convenient .NET detouring library, powered by MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.

Manifest.Name: Kesomannen-GaleModManager
Manifest.Description: A modern and lightweight mod manager for many games on Thunderstore.

Manifest.Name: lagerthon-NonStopHallsGauntlet
Manifest.Description: Fight in a never ending High Halls gauntlet

Manifest.Description: Library for helping with loading vanilla game assets.

Manifest.Description: Taunt Key + Directional Input for Crest Swapping

Manifest.Description: This is a mod that modifies Reaper's combat mode, offering dozens of additional and varied attack styles.

Manifest.Name: danielstegink-SilkAndSong
Manifest.Description: Adds RPG-style level-up mechanic

Manifest.Description: This mod replaces the Hornet with the Kasane Teto SynthV. Be sure to download manually!!!

Manifest.Description: Adds combat synergies between the Needolin and tools

Manifest.Name: Lordloss-True_Steelsoul
Manifest.Description: Quitting during battle is not allowed. Rise to the challenge without backing down! The only true Steelsoul experience

Manifest.Name: hk_speedrunning-TimerMod
Manifest.Description: A simple trigger-based timer for Silksong.

Manifest.Name: Yukikaco-Cinematic_Unity_Explorer

Manifest.Description: Increases the chance of winning against Lumble

Manifest.Name: shownyoung-CUEP
Manifest.Description: Add more features to Cinematic_Unity_Explorer

Manifest.Name: chunniunai-AnySilkBoss
Manifest.Description: This is a mod that modifies Silk's combat mode with two modes, offering dozens of additional and varied attack styles.

Manifest.Description: Rerolls the crest, either on a timer, scene transition, death or taking damage.

Manifest.Description: Simple mod to allow Hornet to throw tools and silk skills while sprinting, does not retain the sprint state (for now?)

Manifest.Name: flibber-MusicRando
Manifest.Description: Music randomization mod

Manifest.Name: Arbaz9234-AlwaysLongClaw
Manifest.Description: Longclaw effect permanent on your tools.

Manifest.Name: cometcake575-FSMSeer
Manifest.Description: Shows active FSM names and states above objects when F3 is pressed.

Manifest.Name: al3ks1s-SilkenSisters
Manifest.Description: Mod that adds a duo Lace/Phantom memory fight - Playtest version, expect bugs and weird issues. Report issues at https://github.com/al3ks1s/SilkenSisters/issues.

Manifest.Name: spacemonkeyy-MetalPipeSound
Manifest.Description: Replaces every bell impact sound with the metal pipe sound effect.

Manifest.Description: Genshin Impact styled Animated Health Bar and Hit Indicator. A mod that elevates combat feedback to a whole new level.

Manifest.Description: Refunds Silk when Cross Stitch fails, removing punishment for missed parries.

Manifest.Name: DerVorce-BoundSoul

Manifest.Name: danielstegink-CustomNeedolin
Manifest.Description: Replaces the Needolin's music with user-selected music files

Manifest.Description: 丝之歌的全能增强模组。一站式整合经济、战斗、随机化、开发者工具等上百项功能，通过强大GUI实现极致自定义。 | The ultimate Silksong overhaul mod. Unify economy tweaks, combat rewrites, randomizers, dev tools, and more into one powerful GUI for total control.

Manifest.Description: Silksong skin featuring mango puppy (65% done)

Manifest.Description: Reflects Pharloom left-right.

Manifest.Description: Deprecated, changed into Voidsong

Manifest.Description: Prevents Rosaries and Shell Shards from being destroyed by spikes, like in Hollow Knight.

Manifest.Name: Xneal-BestHealthBar
Manifest.Description: Trialmod

Manifest.Name: zlq-SilksongFocusQoL
Manifest.Description: Pauses game and mutes audio when window loses focus; auto-unpauses within configurable time window.

Manifest.Name: Vitaxses-CutEnding
Manifest.Description: Adds the abandoned ending back into the game

Manifest.Name: Bigfootmech-Silksong_Mouse_Inventory_Use
Manifest.Description: Use Mouse in the Inventory (Work in Progress).

Manifest.Name: jakobhellermann-BepInExConfigurationManager
Manifest.Description: In-Game Plugin configuration manager for BepInEx

Manifest.Name: jakobhellermann-BepinExScriptEngine
Manifest.Description: Hot reloading for mods installed in `BepinEx/scripts/` folder

Manifest.Name: Wagyu-SilksongMinimapWithCocoonCompass
Manifest.Description: Adds a vanilla-looking Area Minimap and Cocoon Compass.

Manifest.Name: OrderOfTheGoons-Immortal_Architect
Manifest.Description: Makes the architect not die even when you buy all their items. Also adds more dialogue for them.

Manifest.Name: Bigfootmech-Silksong_Reduce_Motion
Manifest.Description: Reduce Motion (Accessibility) - Reduce number of attention-drawing static UI elements.

Manifest.Name: Bigfootmech-Silksong_Keyboard_Inventory_Fix
Manifest.Description: Fix the inventory key for keyboard (break for controller).

Manifest.Name: JngoCreates-LostSinner
Manifest.Description: Mods the First Sinner boss from Hollow Knight: Silksong to be slightly more difficult.

Manifest.Name: JngoCreates-MuckedBeastfly
Manifest.Description: Adds a third Savage Beastfly fight to Bilehaven.

Manifest.Name: CardiaDarkhill-LegacyoftheAbyss
Manifest.Description: Legacy of the Abyss is a full co-op experience for Silksong. With a unique second playable character: The Shade!

Manifest.Name: Esper89-ToggleSprint
Manifest.Description: Lets you keep sprinting without holding down the Dash key.

Manifest.Name: Bergbok-GunZ
Manifest.Description: Lets you animation cancel most actions.

Manifest.Name: Bergbok-Scuttlebraced
Manifest.Description: Always-on Scuttlebrace.

Manifest.Name: JonathanCordero-MagnetiteBroochPlus
Manifest.Description: Makes Magnetite Brooch attract shell shards towards the player.

Manifest.Name: chinccw-SilksongDeathSoundMod
Manifest.Description: add a death sound on player dead.

Manifest.Name: Unavailable-EndingIndicators
Manifest.Description: A mod that shows which endings were completed for every save slot.

Manifest.Name: itsschwer-NeedleSwapper
Manifest.Description: A small mod that allows you to downgrade (change) which Needle upgrade Hornet uses — check the README!

Manifest.Name: XiaohaiMod-ShowDamage_HealthBar
Manifest.Description: Displays enemy health bars and damage numbers when attacking enemies in the game.

Manifest.Name: cometcake575-HeartlessBellhome
Manifest.Description: Disables the heartbeat sound in the Bellhome caused by some objects.

Manifest.Name: coderCleric-Handwarmer
Manifest.Description: Prevents the cold effect on Mount Fay from causing damage.

Manifest.Name: tisawesomeness-ShutUpGMS
Manifest.Description: Disables the frequent screaming, rumbling, and screen darkening in the game's final Act

Manifest.Name: KnotSora-OriginalHornetVoiceLines
Manifest.Description: Makes Hornet say her lines from the original Hollow Knight when using a silk skill.

Manifest.Name: cometcake575-NoWingsDip
Manifest.Description: Removes the few frames at the start of the double jump in which you do not move upwards.

Manifest.Name: Mhz-FlintSlatePlus
Manifest.Description: Extend FlintSlate fire enhancement duration. 强化燧石板，追着小怪砍。

Manifest.Name: Mhz-Teleport
Manifest.Description: A simple teleportation mod. 简单传送，随时掌控。

Manifest.Name: TheWackyKnight-Crest_Selector
Manifest.Description: Use any crest in the game at any point! Press F1 to open config menu in game to select a crest!

Manifest.Name: TheWackyKnight-Cursed_Crest_mode
Manifest.Description: Start the game with the cursed crest permanently! No more tools, skills, or heals! Use F9 to toggle on and off!

Manifest.Name: TheBeastUnleashed-BEYOND_INFINITE_for_Act_3_Final_Boss
Manifest.Description: Replaces the theme of the secret final boss with batman arkham vengeance tm's BEYOND INFINITE remix.

Manifest.Name: Cuckson-Godhome
Manifest.Description: Boss Scene Loader for Silksong

Manifest.Name: NordLandeW-Nail1ATK
Manifest.Description: Change your nail damage to 1.

Manifest.Name: Mhz-HPFlashColor
Manifest.Description: Enemy hit flash color changes based on their remaining HP percentage. 根据敌人剩余血量百分比改变受击闪烁颜色。

Manifest.Name: TheWackyKnight-Hollow_Knight_Death_Swap_for_Silksong
Manifest.Description: Play Hollow Knight and Silksong simultaneously, when you die in one, you instantly swap to the other. Requries both games running with their respective mods

Manifest.Name: Mhz-FreeEquip
Manifest.Description: Allows blue and yellow tools to be equipped in each other's slots. 允许蓝色和黄色工具互相装备到对方的槽位。

Manifest.Name: Cuckson-HarderSong
Manifest.Description: Reduce Binding Heal to 2, Doubles all Boss Health.

Manifest.Name: RatherChaotic-SilksongCustomizer
Manifest.Description: A mod that allows for editing most (if not all) textures in Hollow Knight : Silksong

Manifest.Name: Cuckson-EarlyCompletionist
Manifest.Description: Unlocks the ability to view the percentage of your save file from the beginning.

Manifest.Name: Cuckson-CheapBind
Manifest.Description: Customize the amount of silk needed to bind!

Manifest.Name: Cuckson-BuffBind
Manifest.Description: Binding heals to full, or whatever you want! (works with unique crests)

Manifest.Name: Muco-SilksongLite
Manifest.Description: A lighter alternative to UltimateEasyMode.

Manifest.Name: Muco-UltimateEasyMode
Manifest.Description: The ultimate modpack to make your Silksong gameplay as relaxing as possible

Manifest.Name: BlueRaja-double_shards
Manifest.Description: Double the shards obtained from all sources

Manifest.Name: Bigfootmech-Silksong_Remove_Atmosphere_Aka_Myopia_Filter
Manifest.Description: Make the game easier to see, and lessen eye strain.

Manifest.Name: BlueRaja-double_silk
Manifest.Description: Doubles silk (MP used for healing and abilities) from all sources

Manifest.Name: BlueRaja-double_rosaries
Manifest.Description: Double the rosaries obtained from all sources

Manifest.Name: BlueRaja-rosaries_never_permanently_lost
Manifest.Description: When dying a second time, combines death cocoons instead of permanently losing rosaries

Manifest.Name: XiaohaiMod-ReBack
Manifest.Description: This MOD automatically teleports you back to your death location after respawning, saving you time from walking back to where you died.

Manifest.Name: Nordbo-SimpleDeathCounter
Manifest.Description: A tiny on-screen death counter that just works, with a little animation when you die, with a config that updates in real time without having to restart the game to take effect

Manifest.Name: Bigfootmech-Silksong_Skip_Intro
Manifest.Description: Skip the Team Cherry, and 'Loading Symbol' info every time game starts. QOL for people opening the game multiple times, eg: modders

Manifest.Name: Mhz-ArchitectDrill
Manifest.Description: Replaces Architect's downward attack with Delver's Drill effect. 将建筑师向下攻击替换为掘洞钻效果。无限钻取，随时启动。

Manifest.Name: nonpolynomial-SilkSchlong
Manifest.Description: Buttplug.io sex toy control mod for Hollow Knight - Silksong

Manifest.Name: Skydorm-AbilitiesUnlocked
Manifest.Description: Unlock all (Or specific) abilities at start of new game.

Manifest.Name: pseudopulse-ToolRefund
Manifest.Description: Refunds tool charges upon death (pending refunds expire upon successfully using a bench.)

Manifest.Name: x753-Easy_Journal
Manifest.Description: You only need to kill one of each enemy to complete its hunter's journal entry.

Manifest.Name: stebars-IncreasePlayerDamage
Manifest.Description: Doubles the damage inflicted by the player. The multiplier can be configured, default is 2. Plugin for BepInEx.

Manifest.Name: EtheraelEspeon-CombatBalance
Manifest.Description: Clamps all damage to 1 and gives longer i-frames to prevent the constant doublehits

Manifest.Name: Skydorm-DamageReduction
Manifest.Description: Should reduce the damage of most enemies and Bosses. Some that trigger twice still deal double damage.

Manifest.Name: EtheraelEspeon-Invincibility
Manifest.Description: Makes you invincible by healing you for 1 every frame. I'm sure it's very performant.

Manifest.Name: Phoebe-ClownHornet
Manifest.Description: Adds a floating clown hat, with an arrow pointing towards Hornet.

Manifest.Name: Zekai-NoVignettePlugin
Manifest.Description: Disables the 'dark' vignette that follows player around.

Manifest.Name: x753-FreeCompass
Manifest.Description: The compass costs 0 and doesn't need to be equipped to use it. Configurable.

Manifest.Name: timothymarriott-Rando
Manifest.Description: Silksong Rando

Manifest.Name: cometcake575-EternalNight
Manifest.Description: Makes every enemy in every act have void attacks and buffs.

Manifest.Name: silksong_modding-Silksong_FsmUtil
Manifest.Description: A library for mods to easily make changes to PlayMakerFSMs.

Manifest.Name: Clazex-FastFastTravel
Manifest.Description: Skips fast travel animations, and let the Bell Beast be standby everywhere.

Manifest.Name: Silkysong-Silkysong_ReloadRosaryCannon
Manifest.Description: Allows the player to reload the Rosary Cannon using the Architect Crest in Hollow Knight: Silksong.

Manifest.Description: Mod for me and my friends. Something about re-fight bosses and balance changes (in future) without UI
